aboutPage.pageSubtitle: Learn more about GammaLab Diagnostic Laboratory

aboutSection.title: ABOUT US
aboutSection.p1: GammaLab Diagnostic Laboratory LLP is a modern molecular genetic laboratory — a union of professionals, a cohesive team solving a number of promising scientific and practical tasks related to various areas of modern technologies in the field of disease diagnostics.
aboutSection.p2: The main goal of the laboratory is research activities in promising areas of laboratory diagnostics, as well as the implementation of new solutions related to molecular tumor profiling, providing the first step of personalized medicine.
aboutSection.p3: The laboratory is equipped with the most modern equipment, allowing research at a level that meets international standards. The qualifications of employees and the ability to perform research at a modern level allows the laboratory to participate in clinical trials.
aboutSection.p4: Laboratory specialists are authors of publications in Kazakhstani and foreign scientific journals. Employees have certificates allowing them to work in the practical healthcare system and have completed internships at leading institutions engaged in molecular genetic research.
aboutSection.p5: We are constantly expanding the range of molecular genetic studies performed, which is why the largest state healthcare institutions and private medical centers trust us.
aboutSection.p6: GammaLab LLP is a participant in the guaranteed volume of free medical care (GVFMC) program and compulsory social health insurance (CSHI) as a co-executor and service provider.
aboutSection.p7: The laboratory provides a comprehensive approach to laboratory diagnostics and provides constant support to its clients. GammaLab LLP specializes in a narrow field, striving for high quality in laboratory testing. Our focus on specific areas of research allows us to achieve outstanding results.

reagentsSection.title: REAGENTS AND CONSUMABLES
reagentsSection.p1: We work exclusively with high-quality reagents and consumables that have proven their diagnostic capability. Blood collection is performed using vacuum systems with disposable needles, which ensure comfort and safety for both patients and medical staff.

logisticsSection.title: LOGISTICS AND TRANSPORTATION
logisticsSection.howToSend: How to send material to GAMMALAB laboratory?
logisticsSection.freeHelpDesc: Application for research within the framework of free assistance to the population of RK
logisticsSection.step1Title: Patient registration in KMIS for research
logisticsSection.step1Note: if LPU integration with GammaLab is available
logisticsSection.step2Title: Patient registration in Partner's Personal Account
logisticsSection.step2Note: if there is no LPU integration with GammaLab
logisticsSection.callCenter: If you have any questions, call the call center
logisticsSection.barcodeNote: Patient's biomaterial is assigned a barcode from GammaLab
logisticsSection.doc2: Copy of extract with histological conclusion
logisticsSection.deliveryCourierDesc: The operator informs the doctor of the address, date and time of biomaterial transfer. The courier delivers the material to the laboratory.
logisticsSection.deliverySelfDesc: The patient delivers the material to the laboratory at
logisticsSection.deliveryDays: Within 2 working days from material collection
logisticsSection.analysisDays: From 5 to 14 working days depending on the type of research
logisticsSection.resultsDesc: Results are sent to the patient's e-mail. GVFMC results are automatically sent to KMIS.

equipmentSection.title: EQUIPMENT
equipmentSection.p1: The laboratory is equipped with the latest diagnostic equipment from leading manufacturers, which ensures the highest diagnostic accuracy and allows for correct identification of disease causes and selection of the best treatment strategy.
equipmentSection.p2: The laboratory has about 50 types of instruments and analyzers. This allows performing more than 100 of the most popular tests within one day.

analysesSection.title: ANALYSES
analysesSection.description: The main goal of the laboratory is to work in promising areas of laboratory diagnostics, as well as to implement new solutions related to the study of mutations in tumor tissue for the selection of targeted therapy.
analysesSection.chartSubtitle: Treatment directions based on diagnostic results

advantagesSection.adv1: Laboratory information system and sample barcoding at collection point
advantagesSection.adv2: Highly qualified specialists with extensive experience in multidisciplinary laboratory
advantagesSection.adv3: Maximum automation of all work processes
advantagesSection.adv4: Courier service and sample transportation meeting preanalytical stage requirements
advantagesSection.adv5: Equipment and reagents from leading global manufacturers
advantagesSection.adv6: Participation in external quality control systems
advantagesSection.adv7: Staff training in preanalytical stage rules

qualitySection.title: QUALITY MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
qualitySection.p1: The activities of biomaterial collection points and the GammaLab laboratory are carried out in accordance with sanitary requirements and recommendations of the World Health Organization.
qualitySection.item1: Quality control department for service provision
qualitySection.item2: QMS Manager – monitoring all customer inquiries
qualitySection.item3: Internal laboratory quality control manager for performed tests

experienceSection.title: EXPERIENCE AND COOPERATION
experienceSection.p1: We have extensive experience working with regions of the Republic of Kazakhstan, established and reliable logistics for interaction with medical organizations during 2019-2021 with public and private healthcare institutions under GVFMC and CSHI programs.
experienceSection.p2: In the field of oncogenetics and immunohistochemistry (IHC), we have been cooperating with public and private healthcare institutions under GVFMC since 2022.
experienceSection.p3: Connection to the laboratory information system (LIS K-LAB), integrated with medical information systems (DAMUMED, ZHETYSU).
experienceSection.p4: Since 2019, more than 30,000 tests have been performed in all areas, including: Covid19, T-spotTB, enzyme immunoassays and general clinical analyses.
experienceSection.p5: Since 2022, the laboratory has been consistently developing personalized diagnostics, implementing modern molecular genetic and immunohistochemical research methods.
experienceSection.statsTitle: Comparison of cancer mutation detection rates with global standards:

patients.title: For Patients
patients.pageSubtitle: Everything you need to know about testing at GammaLab

preparationSection.title: HOW TO PREPARE FOR TESTS
preparationSection.igraSubtitle: Gold standard for diagnosing latent tuberculosis infection (LTBI)
preparationSection.igraDesc: IGRA tests are the best alternative to skin tests (Mantoux test and Diaskintest).
preparationSection.elispotDesc: A blood test with high reliability that provides results within 2 days.
preparationSection.advantage1Desc: Anyone can take the ELISPOT test. There are no contraindications for this test.
preparationSection.advantage2Desc: Only 1 visit to the laboratory is required — no need to return for result verification.
preparationSection.advantage3Desc: No special preparation is required for the test.
generalPrepList: Blood should be drawn on an empty stomach (at least 8 hours after the last meal)
Avoid alcohol and fatty foods 24 hours before the test
Refrain from smoking 1 hour before blood collection
Rest for 10-15 minutes immediately before blood collection

rulesSection.title: BLOOD COLLECTION RULES
rulesSection.mainRule: Blood is collected from a vein into a vacutainer with NA heparin or Li heparin.
rulesSection.volume1: Adults and children 10 years and older
rulesSection.important1: Blood collection is performed only at specialized collection points or at the laboratory
rulesSection.important2: Disposable vacuum systems are used for patient safety
rulesSection.important3: It is recommended not to remove the bandage for 10-15 minutes after blood collection

deadlinesSection.title: TEST TURNAROUND TIMES
deadlinesSection.note: Turnaround times may vary depending on test complexity. Please confirm exact times when placing your order.

faqSection.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
faqSection.q1: What is T-SPOT.TB and how is it different from Mantoux?
faqSection.a1: T-SPOT.TB is a modern immunological tuberculosis test performed using a blood sample. Unlike the Mantoux test, it doesn't require a follow-up visit, doesn't give false positives in BCG-vaccinated individuals, and has higher accuracy.
faqSection.q2: Do I need to prepare for the T-SPOT.TB test?
faqSection.a2: No special preparation is required. It is recommended to have blood drawn on an empty stomach or 3-4 hours after a light meal.
faqSection.q3: Can children take the T-SPOT.TB test?
faqSection.a3: Yes, the test can be performed on children of any age. The volume of blood collected depends on the child's age.
faqSection.q4: How do I receive my test results?
faqSection.a4: Results are sent to the patient's email. They can also be obtained in person at the laboratory or through the partner's personal account.
faqSection.q5: Do you accept tests under GVFMC/CSHI programs?
faqSection.a5: Yes, our laboratory participates in the GVFMC and CSHI programs. A referral from a doctor is required for free testing.

rightsSection.title: PATIENT RIGHTS
rightsSection.intro: In accordance with the legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan, every patient has the right to:
rightsSection.right1Desc: Receiving medical services of proper quality in accordance with established standards
rightsSection.right2Desc: Receiving complete information about diagnostic methods, their risks, and alternatives before testing
rightsSection.right3Desc: Protection of personal data and medical confidentiality. Test results are provided only to the patient or authorized persons
rightsSection.right4Desc: Polite and attentive treatment from medical staff
rightsSection.right5Desc: The ability to file a complaint in case of violation of your rights or inadequate service quality
rightsSection.contactDesc: If you have questions or complaints, please contact us:
